channel.title: [PI] How to make a multi combat zone
channel.description: I can't seem to get it to work. Is it in player.java or npc.java. And how do I get the x and y working?

item.title: [PI] How to make a multi combat zone
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

kutmasta:

I can’t seem to get it to work. Is it in player.java or npc.java. And how do I get the x and y working?

It’s best to put it in both.
If you only want more then one npc to attack one player without another player interfering then don’t put it in player.java
If that makes sense

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to make a multi combat zone

item.title: [PI] How to make a multi combat zone
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

player.java search for
public boolean inmulti

go to the south east corner and typ ::mypos or ::coords and then north east corner and do the same.
add the coords in the multi boolean and done.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to make a multi combat zone
